20. April 1961
Dear Mr. Tyler,
with much interest we regularly read
the MNAEB-Journal", to the editor-staff of which y°u
belong. We often receive valuable hints from this
periodical for the radio-tv-pages of our own review.
With the same mail we eend you a copy of„oarPefio*f°al
"Volkshochschule im Westen" ("Polk High Schoil in toe
West"), in which you find the translation of an article,
you wrote for the "NAEB-Journal". As you see, your
work in the United States is reflected fa£ away’ *nth_
the Federal Republic of Germany, as here and there the
same interests are persued.
The article mentioned above is published on page 72
of our review.
Assuring you that we will also in the future watch
with a keen eye the serious informations and comment!
in your review, we remain
Yours affectionately
(Karl d. Joeressen)
